name: xmlChildPos
description:
Gets the position of a child element within an XML document
 object.
 The position, in an XmlChildren array, of the Nth child that
 has the specified name.

params.name: elem
params.description: XML element within which to search

params.name: childname
params.description: XML child element for which to search

params.name: n
params.description: Index of XML child element for which to search
